name: Ovum City
description:
Terminal Two is the first release from Endless Studios, the gaming division of Endless, Founded in 2011, Endless is focused on building technology that cultivates digital agency among youth. Our projects, organizations and businesses share a common goal of enabling user agency.
Many of our games can be played directly on our website at https://www.terminaltwo.com/ourgames.

GET ALL THE TERMINAL TWO GAMES:

You can play the full suite of games on Endless OS, Mac and PC by downloading our game platform. The Terminal Two game platform contains a visual map, with progress tracking and curricular guidance, and all of our games. This can be downloaded at https://www.terminaltwo.com/download.

PLAY OUR OTHER GAMES:

Many games like Aqueducts, The Passage and FrogSquash are in the App Store.

Many of our games can be played directly on our website at https://www.terminaltwo.com/ourgames.

Privacy Policy: https://www.terminaltwo.com/privacy_policy
Terms of Service: https://www.terminaltwo.com/terms_of_service
